definition: the Yellow Springs/the underworld of Chinese mythology/the equivalent of Hades or Hell
to visit the Yellow Springs/to die
lit. to return to the Yellow Springs 黃泉|黄泉[Huang2 quan2] (idiom)/fig. to die/to meet one's end

sentences.english: The other shore spends the first flower that is a future life, it is the only landscape on Acheron road.
sentences.chinese: 彼岸花是來生的第一朵花，是黃泉路上的唯一風景。

sentences.english: Wife are empty, son of space, would not meet the Styx.
sentences.chinese: 妻也空，子也空，黃泉路上不相逢。

sentences.english: One of these is the battlements and defenses of the city of Dis.
sentences.chinese: 這些的當中是黃泉城市的城垛和防禦。

sentences.english: The police arrived within minutes, but by then they were dead.
sentences.chinese: 警察幾分鐘後趕到，不過那時他們都已命喪黃泉。

sentences.english: Now, I fall into their lives, you Biluo immortalized .
sentences.chinese: 而今，我墮入黃泉，你永生碧落。
